item.title: HyppTV Set-top box connect to Play Store
item.description: TM provided an Android based set-top box (STB) for customers to watch HyppTV channels. When starting up, Play Store icon appears on main screen but when attempting to sign in, I kept getting a connection error message. After spending a bit of time, I found the solution.

item.title: TP-Link Archer C7 v2 OpenWRT VLAN UniFi HyppTV
item.description: There are many tutorials available on Internet on how to setup VLAN on OpenWRT Chaos Calmer 15.05 but finding one specifically for Archer C7 v2 with the right VLAN settings for Malaysia’s UniFi HyppTV was a little challenging. In the process of trial and error, I had to recover my router from failsafe mode so please be careful.
